item.Content: The Sony 54.6-Inch 4K/UHD HDR 3D Smart TV offers extraordinary performance for an enhanced entertainment experience. Built with an OLED screen, this 54.6-inch TV produces deeper blacks and a higher contrast ratio. It features 4K resolution and HDR technology, meaning that it has a broader range of color and delivers natural hues in each picture. It features X-Reality PRO technology, which boosts the quality of lower resolution media, making normal high-definition images have near UHD detail. This TV features built-in Wi-Fi, so you can stream online content. It supports DTS for enhanced audio and a captivating entertainment experience. It comes with a voice remote, so you can channel surf with the sound of your voice.
